title: Jeff Eaton from Modern Life Is War
itunes:title: Jeff Eaton from Modern Life Is War
description:
One afternoon the vocalist of Modern Life Is War, Jeff Eaton, and I spoke at length about small town living, reflection and reunions. We spoke before their appearance at the 2013 edition of This Is Hardcore. It's a very honest and reflective chat about many different issues that I hope you enjoy. Brought to you in conjunction with Propertyofzack.com 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
